Articles.Content:
I sure hope the cords on my chute aren't brittle in the cold!

*crack*

Flying a semi-automatic quantum computer

"I hope it doesn't restart on its own... Wait, why am I falli-"

Going to school without a backpack

"I don't NEED a backpack, I'll just carry my binder in my back pocket." 5 hours later... "Ok class, take out your backpacks. Anyone who doesn't comply will be sent to the office and be forced to listen to the sound of spaghetti."

Dropping a kerbal off of the space station.

Edited October 4, 2022 by Rutabaga22

Now detaching Escape Pod 1…Wait! I forgot to put Jeb inside! He's in space now! He's dead…

Dropping a warp core off a space station

"Ok, unnecessary weight was ejected. Wait, was that our core? WHO DROPPED IT OUT???"

*4 hours later*

"*Intercom* Hey dear crewmates, as you may have noticed, our oxygen levels dropped down to 0. Some may have passed waya and soemem mayaib by liev but makeki sueer thhath yuh setbatls aee-"

Dropping a space station from orbit

MECO and the Kir space station is now in the atmosphere! Wait! I forgot to launch the escape pods! 

Overheat a Overheater

"Overheating the overheater. Wait, overheaters should be electrical devices, righ-"

Having a runny nose

Where is my nose? 

Overheating the overheater that is overheating another overheater

"What does this button do?"

 

 

Flashing a new ROM to an Android phone.

What do you mean by, I could brick my phone?

Float in a Deck Chair using weather balloons.

"Did anyone see where I put the regulator for my oxygen hose?" 

 

 

About to eat the hottest chilli in the world

I'm gonna make it.

Drink hydrazine

"Hmm, this doesnt quite seem like water"

Leaning on a chair

Hey wait isn't this the chair you brok-

Mixing Unsymmetrical dimethylhydrazine with Nitrogen tetroxide

Edited October 9, 2022 by Abel Military Services

"Should I be wearing safety goggles for this?"

 

 

Taking the first steps on Mars

"Should I put on boots? Probably not..."

 

Taking the first steps off Mars

"Did you feel that?"

 

 

Running from sandworms on Mars

"Drum sand!"

 

Running from sandworms on Eeloo

"Sandworms on Eeloo? That thing has no sand at all!" 6 years later "AHHHHHHHHHH! Please don't kill me! This will be fi- not cliiiiiffffffffff!" SPLAT!

Holding your thumb near the space bar while deorbiting.

*ka-CHUNK!*

 

Holding you thumb near the space bar while doing a transfer burn

"Just going to press Alt+> for timewar-  Pchew""Awww man there goes the transfer stage."

Forgetting to finish the forum game post

My mom's calling me…

Ironic death.

"Haha, hehe, no WAIT NO I WAS JOKING IT WAS AN IRO- *reaches 2.33% of light speed*"

Playing TF2

Ah, another hoovy game. Hey that battle engi is dominating me! 

Quantum entanglement
I hope it doesn’t trip me
